ygData.subject: Where should I hunt at lvl 16 to get some armor and a decent 2hd  magic weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a basic set of banded and I am at lvl 16. I really need a magic weapon but do not have any money left after purchasing the banded armor. I really need a
ygData.messageBody:
I have a basic set of banded and I am at lvl 16. I really need a magic
weapon but do not have any money left after purchasing the banded armor. I
really need a weapon more than anything right now since I have basic armor.
I play on Tarrew Marr , not that that really matters. I am currently bound
to Qeynos. If someone wants to they could hunt with me tonight and show me
all the wonderful loot I have been missing. :-)
